entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
